description: This route passes through confederation park,scenic park and strataford park along the seaside of the Vancouver harbour.  Families often come to Confederation Park for the entire day. Come picnic among the trees before taking a ride on the Model Steam Railway that operates on the weekends during the summer. On a hot summer day, everyone can cool off and at the outdoor water play area or go swimming at the Eileen Dailly Leisure Pool and Fitness Centre.
directions: 49.286933, -123.003016 you can take no.c1 bus to get off at WB Eton st. FS N Willington Ave.
title: confederation -scenic park trans-canada trail
